title: How to Make Rumtopf (Rum Pot)

steps.headline: Peel all the fruits you have selected to use in your rumtopf (however if you have plums, they don't need to be peeled).
steps.description: Then wash them clean, drain, pat dry with a paper towel, and slice.

steps.headline: Put a sum of sugar on the bottom of the jar, followed by some assorted sliced fruits, then pour on a sum of rum.
steps.description: Repeat these steps until all sugar, fruits and rum are in the pot. (The idea is to soak the fruit with rum).

steps.headline: Cover the top of jar with plastic wrap before placing the lid on the jar.
Place the rumtopf jar in a cool area for at least 2-3 months.
Enjoy with ice cream, cream, cake, waffles, yogurt etc.
